text_block_list.text:
As soon as they started, I understood. This is what Gran Alegria 
meant when she said 『I'll show you I can make that dream real!』

Both of them were off to a great start. 
Gran Alegria didn't seem nervous either.

But, her opponent was Taiki Shuttle. An opponent with overwhelming 
strength was facing an Uma Musume who hadn't even debuted——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: …… Haa, haaaaaaa……!!

I realized it immediately after seeing Gran Alegria run for 
real for the first time. She was still a little rough 
around the edges, but I could sense an exceptional strength.

Even breathing and a steady speed. Even against someone like 
Taiki Shuttle she had the mental strength to remain calm.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
……! Fufu, I can feel the heat behind me……! 
Gran's gaze is giving me goosebumps!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
But……more, more……! 
This isn't enough for me!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
That which I couldn't obtain…… 
With that passion, let me feel more of it……!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Haa…… haa……amazing, she's amazing! 
Every step feels like it's pressuring me directly……!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
…… Ahaa! I'm getting fired up……it's fun, it's so fun! 
Miles really are the best! Milers are the best! I'm, I'm…

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Really getting motivated……!!

She was speeding up, with no signs of slowing. 
She was trying to line up with that Taiki Shuttle.

I swallowed. 
I could feel the potential in Gran Alegria's running.

It wasn't……such a far-fetched dream. 
She had the potential within her to reach a dream like that.
——Suddenly——

I could see myself standing amidst the cheering. 
With Gran Alegria standing beside me, laughing.

I realized it was just my imagination, but as I continued 
watching her run, those images wouldn't stop coming to mind.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!!!

——Conquering all three distances. The true Mile Queen. 
It wasn't just a dream, she was overflowing with potential.
She could. If it was her——then she might be able to do it.

She could do it. She could reach that dream. Together with 
Gran Alegria——we could be the ones that those cheers were for.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Haaa～! I worked up a nice sweat! 
Today too, I'll take a nice shower and feel refreshed!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. Just like I thought, it was really exciting. 
I'm really looking forward to her running from now on!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ……conquering all three distances.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Show it to me too. 
A scene that I couldn't see, no matter how much I wanted to.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, Trainer-san, how was that!? 
Doesn't it make you want to form a real contract!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Taiki-senpai's running was really awesome! 
As expected of a Miler. Of course, me too!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ? Trainer-san?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Yes?
choice_data_list: I want to chase that dream with you!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Wah! So you're on board now!?

I could see Gran Alegria standing as the true Mile Queen. 
I could see us basking in the cheers together.

In my excitement, I ended up saying everything that came to mind. 
That's how excited I was, I couldn't stop myself.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ! Potential……

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
For an Uma Musume, distance compatibility is a huge barrier. 
However, a Miler is overflowing with potential.

text_block_list.name: Former Mile King's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
A potential that can overcome even 
that distance compatibility barrier.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
(……the potential within me. 
If I can find that, then I……I can……)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san can see my potential……

text_block_list.name: Spectator
text_block_list.text: 『Miles are the best! It's the birth of the True Mile Queen!』

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: (——so many people. A huge cheer erupts through the crowd)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
(……even though I can't hear anything else, 
there's still one voice I can hear……)

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Now……just now! 
I've come up with a new MiRule!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
When I win, I'll definitely look for Trainer-san! 
And then, I'll get you to say it.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
『If it's Gran Alegria, then it's only natural!』!! 
This will be my……no, Trainer-san's and MiRule!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: And then, when we eventually conquer all three distances——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I want you to say 『We made it, together!』

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I want you to say 『We made it, together!』

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san! Please form a contract with me! 
Let's chase after that dream together!

Was it really okay to decide everything based 
on MiRules?——That was the only thing that had 
me worried, so I decided to ask her about it.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
That's just the starting point! I just thought if someone 
fit MiRules, they'd be more likely to share the same dream.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
But now, I've got a new MiRule! 
It has to be with Trainer-san, otherwise it won't be possible.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……Trainer-san! 
Let's fulfill our dream!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
The True Mile Queen…… 
Conquering the three distances——we'll show that Miles are the best!

……conquering all three distances, becoming the True Mile Queen. 
It's a wonderful dream isn't it, Gran-chan?
——However.

text_block_list.name: Almond Eye
text_block_list.text: ……The one who will carve out that legend first, will be me.
